Now the app is more secured with your touch ID / face ID / passcode.
We have enhanced the app further so that you could have a better experience than before.

Introducing the CRED wishlist. Now you can save the rewards you like in one place, and keep them close; just like your loved ones. Speaking of ‘close’, card linking has arrived. Now link multiple cards from the same bank. This means keeping track of your cards gets even more easier. Keeping track reminds us, with the new search functionality, now you get to see all offers from your bank in one place. Find what you want even faster. There are other under-the-hood minor tweaks and updates too. Try it out. You will feel the upgrade. Everyone does.

Unlocked: Nostalgia. Introducing the snake game; now your phone turns into an arcade system whenever you unplug from the internet. Also included are other minor under-the-hood tweaks and updates. You will feel the upgrade. Everyone does.

Unlocked: Nostalgia. Introducing the snake game; now your phone turns into an arcade system whenever you unplug from the internet. Also included are other minor under-the-hood tweaks and updates. You will feel the upgrade. Everyone does.

Personalisation, now with a cherry on top. CRED now supports the addition of a profile picture. Never miss your face. Also, no more juggling different addresses in your head. Add and manage all your delivery addresses from a single place; one safe space for all your spaces.

We have upgraded in a big way: packaged in a sleek new copper look, this is CRED embracing neumorphism. A design so good, our developers spent much of their time admiring its beauty. During a phase where new experiences are hard to come by, this is one experience that will be hard for you to part with. This is the most visually enticing credit card payment experience yet.

Introducing CRED Win: Take part in games with your CRED coins and bring home big rewards. Yes, the excitement is complimentary. Word of advice: Play to win before the games change and avoid heartbreak over losing out on the rewards.

How does one end up reading app release notes? maybe you are a curious soul. maybe you are another developer appreciating the work of your kin. or maybe you just ended up here, drifting along in your life till this app release note brought attention back to your own existence. you must be feeling an existential crisis right about now and to remedy that feeling, we suggest you experience the new CRED. it's smoother, faster and a much richer experience.

Time.

That's the upgrade for this release.
Our developers and product managers are calling it a completely upgraded version of credit card management, but we know you will only remember it for saving you time. Lots and lots of it.
First off, smart statements is here. In terms of evolution, your statements just went from crawling on all fours to walking straight: you get critical insights on your spends classified by category to give you a comprehensive picture of not only your financial habits, but of you as a person. Start knowing yourself better than your therapist.
Second, the hidden charges detection system has been perfected. No matter how hard your credit card tries to hide it, we will find it for you.

As for the time you have spent reading this release note, you will get it all back once you upgrade. You're welcome.

question things in life. but ask the right questions.
don’t ask "why should I update CRED". ask "how do I make my million dollar business idea come true?".
lucky for you, we have an answer.
introducing CRED Business. now make vendor payments, pay employee salaries and clear office rent with your credit card, instantly.
don't think you’re ready to run a business yet? we’ve got you covered. this update will also get you access to the new 'manage' tab which lets you control everything about your credit card from one place. think of it as practise for managing a business. you’ll need it for your million dollar idea.

don't think you’re ready to run a business yet? we’ve got you covered. this update will also get you access to the new 'manage' tab which lets you control everything about your credit card from one place. think of it as practise for managing a business. you’ll need it for your million dollar idea.

One of our product managers took a philosophy course and got obsessed with the concept of free will. The question that bothered them the most: “What does complete control feel like?“.
This update contains the answer.
Introducing the new “Credit Score” section.
Get in-depth analysis of your score along with personalised insights that guide you towards better financial health and inevitably, a better decision-making framework.
Users on iOS 14 can also add widgets for each of their cards on the home screen and keep track of their due amounts and payment dates at all times. Absolute control? Absolutely.
Now, it’s your turn to exercise your free will for the right cause: get the update.

One of our product managers took a philosophy course and got obsessed with the concept of free will. The question that bothered them the most: “What does complete control feel like?“.
This update contains the answer.
Introducing the new “Credit Score” section.
Get in-depth analysis of your score along with personalised insights that guide you towards better financial health and inevitably, a better decision-making framework.
Users on iOS 14 can also add widgets for each of their cards on the home screen and keep track of their due amounts and payment dates at all times. Absolute control? Absolutely.
Now, it’s your turn to exercise your free will for the right cause: get the update.

Wabi-Sabi.
In Japanese aesthetics, this is a term used for the worldview wherein one finds beauty in the state of imperfection.
Unfortunately, the Japanese don’t have a term for its opposite, because that’s the worldview our developers follow.
This update contains all fixes and improvements essential to perfect your CRED experience.
If you’re a follower of Wabi-Sabi, we recommend you skip this one.

Hi.

Consider this our farewell letter.

Yes, we are leaving quite soon.
No, we had no idea we’d be found out so fast.
Some pesky developer who had too much coffee (or passion) in her veins, discovered us late one night, hiding, and resolved us immediately. Hence, we’re no longer a part of your CRED experience.

Sadly, this means you will enjoy CRED even more.

To our incredibly short romance,
Bugs and Errors

Hi.

Consider this our farewell letter.

Yes, we are leaving quite soon.
No, we had no idea we’d be found out so fast.
Some pesky developer who had too much coffee (or passion) in her veins, discovered us late one night, hiding, and resolved us immediately. Hence, we’re no longer a part of your CRED experience.

Sadly, this means you will enjoy CRED even more.

To our incredibly short romance,
Bugs and Errors

PERF

perfection. that's what our developers were really aiming for, but bugs and errors do creep in. to make errors is human after all.
this is where our quality control team comes in.

PERFEC

they push the app, trying to break it and finding faults. it's a slow process, which is why they're at it 24x7. bit by bit, they uncover all mistakes, till all that's left is:

PERFECTION

this update comes with their approval i.e this will be your smoothest experience on CRED yet.
